name: San Francisco-Marin Food Bank

name: Habitat for Humanity Greater San Francisco
description: Builds affordable housing and empowers families in need of housing in the Bay Area.

name: Homeless Prenatal Program
description: Supports homeless and low-income families in prenatal and parenting services.

name: Peninsula Humane Society & SPCA
description: Promotes animal welfare, rescue, and adoption in San Mateo County.

name: Boys & Girls Clubs of San Francisco
description: Provides youth development programs and support for young people in the Bay Area.

name: Second Harvest of Silicon Valley
description: Distributes food to individuals and families in need in Santa Clara and San Mateo Counties.

name: Crisis Support Services of Alameda County
description: Offers crisis intervention, suicide prevention, and support services.

name: 826 Valencia
description: Provides writing and educational programs for students in San Francisco.

name: The Exploratorium
description: Engages people in scientific exploration and discovery through interactive exhibits and programs.

name: San Francisco SPCA
description: Advocates for animal welfare and provides animal care services in the Bay Area.

name: Swords to Plowshares
description: Supports veterans with housing, employment, and healthcare services.

name: SF-Marin Food Bank
description: Works to end hunger in San Francisco and Marin by providing food to those in need.

name: St. Anthony Foundation
description: Serves low-income and homeless individuals with essential services and support.

name: Project Open Hand
description: Provides meals and nutrition services to seniors and critically ill individuals in the Bay Area.

name: 826 National
description: Supports youth writing and literacy programs in communities across the United States.

name: Compass Family Services
description: Helps homeless families achieve housing stability and self-sufficiency.

name: San Francisco Education Fund

name: La Casa de las Madres

name: Marin Humane
description: Promotes animal welfare and provides animal care services in Marin County.
